name: Access Profile Owner Approval Notification
description: Notify the owner of an Access Profile that it has been granted as a side effect of a Role request being approved.
subject: A user has been granted ${accessProfileName} via a role request
body:
Dear ${user.name},

${requesterName}'s request for the role ${requestedRoleName}#if($requesterName != $requestedForIdentityName) for ${requestedForIdentityName}#end has been approved. ${requestedForIdentityName} has been granted all access profiles contained in that role, including ${accessProfileName}.#if($removeDate) ${requesterName}â€™s access to ${accessProfileName} is scheduled to end on ${removeDate}.#end You are receiving this email because you are listed as the owner of ${accessProfileName}

Thanks,
The ${PRODUCT_NAME} Team
